itemDisplayName: Blue-green Deployment to Kubernetes with Jenkins
description: This template allows you to do blue-green deployment to Kubernetes cluster with Jenkins. It deploys an instance of Jenkins on a Linux Ubuntu 16.04 LTS VM and an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS). The Jenkins instance will configured with jobs to deploy Tomcat container to the AKS Kubernetes in blue/green environment, and automatically switch to the latest environment without downtime.
summary: This template deploys a Jenkins instance and an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), with Jenkins jobs configured to do blue-green deployment to AKS Kubernetes.
